_documentation.notice: This trusted sender list is a baseline of commonly safe, globally recognized domains, provided as a convenience. You may freely add, modify, or remove entries to suit your region, security posture, and use case.
_documentation.purpose: Domains in this list receive fast-track processing with minimal security analysis due to high trust level
_documentation.how_to_add: Add domain names to the 'trusted_domains' array and optionally document them in 'trusted_domains_notes'
_documentation.security_note: Trusted domains still undergo authentication checks (SPF/DKIM/DMARC), phishing detection, and RBL lookups. They receive a small score reduction (-3 points) and skip only BEC, typosquatting, and marketing spam modules.

trusted_domains_notes.accounts.google.com: Google account security notifications and alerts
trusted_domains_notes.adobe.com: Adobe Creative Cloud and document service notifications
trusted_domains_notes.amazonses.com: Amazon SES - legitimate transactional email service
trusted_domains_notes.americanexpress.com: American Express - major credit card issuer
trusted_domains_notes.datto.com: Datto - automated backup reports and system notifications (high volume, low training value)
trusted_domains_notes.dattobackup.com: Datto backup success/failure reports - automated system emails (whitelisted to prevent data skew)
trusted_domains_notes.detr.nv.gov: Nevada Department of Employment, Training and Rehabilitation - state agency
trusted_domains_notes.discover.com: Discover Card - major credit card issuer
trusted_domains_notes.dropbox.com: Dropbox file sharing and collaboration notifications
trusted_domains_notes.em.optumrx.com: OptumRx prescription pharmacy service email notifications
trusted_domains_notes.faa.gov: Federal Aviation Administration - US federal aviation agency
trusted_domains_notes.google.com: Google Workspace, Calendar, Drive service notifications
trusted_domains_notes.info.tsp.gov: Thrift Savings Plan communications - federal employee retirement system
trusted_domains_notes.irs.gov: Internal Revenue Service - US federal tax agency
trusted_domains_notes.lasvegasnevada.gov: City of Las Vegas, Nevada - municipal government communications
trusted_domains_notes.mail.whitehouse.gov: The White House - official communications from the Executive Office of the President
trusted_domains_notes.nevadatax.nv.gov: Nevada Department of Taxation - state tax agency
trusted_domains_notes.nvsilverflume.gov: Nevada Secretary of State SilverFlume business portal - filing reminders and compliance notifications
trusted_domains_notes.optumrx.com: OptumRx prescription pharmacy and health services
trusted_domains_notes.public.govdelivery.com: GovDelivery - government email communication service used by federal, state, and local agencies
trusted_domains_notes.rmm.datto.com: Datto RMM monitoring and alert notifications
trusted_domains_notes.sba.gov: Small Business Administration - US federal agency supporting entrepreneurs
trusted_domains_notes.senate.gov: United States Senate - official Senate communications
trusted_domains_notes.sos.nv.gov: Nevada Secretary of State - official state government business services and filings
trusted_domains_notes.ssa.gov: Social Security Administration - US federal agency
trusted_domains_notes.tsp.gov: Thrift Savings Plan - federal employee retirement savings and investment plan
trusted_domains_notes.usdoj.gov: US Department of Justice - federal government
trusted_domains_notes.usps.com: US Postal Service tracking and alerts
trusted_domains_notes.usps.gov: US Postal Service - official USPS employee and business communications
trusted_domains_notes.uspto.gov: United States Patent and Trademark Office - US federal agency
trusted_domains_notes.utcourts.gov: Utah State Courts - official state judicial system communications
trusted_domains_notes.yourpharmacybenefits.com: Optum pharmacy benefits tracking and notifications

configuration.description: Domains that receive minimal security analysis due to high trust level
